trans-unit.target: TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Duzal Meyean the Steady seeks an exceptional Disciple of the Hand to assist his team of crafts...birds in the creation of delicate components. ※The crafting portion of this quest is recommended for Disciples of the Hand level 15 and above, and the battle portion for Disciples of War or Magic level 48 and above.

TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_SEQ_01<tab>Duzal Meyean has asked you to synthesize high-quality disposal unit components, that crews may safely relieve themselves aboard the <var 1A 02 /var>Dezul Qualan<var 1A 01 /var>. Proper equipment to craft these items, however, is only found at the Diamond Forge in Revenant's Toll. Speak with forgewife Fyrbryda about receiving permission to utilize the facilities.
※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level.

TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_SEQ_02<tab>Fyrbryda's rules for the forge are simple: one, all materials brought inside must be inspected for contraband, and two, if anyone wishes to make use of the facilities, they must first provide a generous contribution to the Revenant's Toll chapter of the Adventurers' Guild. Currently, the guild has need of morbol vines, which will be used to craft stronger ropes for the miners who scale the mountains of Mor Dhona. Travel to the Tangle and slay a resident morbol for its feelers.

TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_SEQ_03<tab>You have obtained an exceptionally thick morbol vine. Return it to Fyrbryda before another miner snaps his neck. Also, do not forget to submit the disposal unit component materials to the forgewife for inspection.

TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_SEQ_04<tab>Fyrbryda has granted you access to the Diamond Forge's crafting facilities. Use the materials given to you by Duzal Meyean and inspected by Fyrbryda to synthesize high-quality disposal unit components. Once completed, return to Ehcatl with the items.
※In the event that the status <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Facility Access: Specialization<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> wears off or the synthesis ends in failure, you may try again by speaking with Fyrbryda.

TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_SEQ_05<tab>You have delivered the disposal unit components to Duzal Meyean. The veteran is deeply grateful for your efforts, which will ensure that the <var 1A 02 /var>Dezul Qualan<var 1A 01 /var> is not plagued by unpleasant odors. When next you are willing to contribute to their cause, he looks forward to working with you again.
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Fyrbryda in Revenant's Toll.
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_TODO_01<tab>Obtain a thick morbol vine from a morbol in the Tangle.
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_TODO_02<tab>Present the disposal unit component materials and the morbol vine to Fyrbryda.

TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_TODO_03<tab><var 08 E3E802E803 ((Synthesize disposal unit components <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var>)) ((Deliver the disposal unit components <var 28 ((Addon)) 0A01 /var> to Duzal Meyean the Steady)) /var>.

TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_000<tab>Caw! Quick hands, I seek. Feathered, featherless, I care not. My brethren, I love, but all talons, they are. Grace, they have not. Perfection, they cannot achieve.

TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_010<tab>Tasked with crafting of <var 1A 02 /var>Dezul Qualan<var 1A 01 /var>'s disposal unit, we are. If filter not perfect, our waste will collect. Thick with fumes, air will become. Fall ill, crew will! Caw!

TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_020<tab>Tasked with crafting of <var 1A 02 /var>Dezul Qualan<var 1A 01 /var>'s disposal unit, we are. If deodorizing agent not perfect, persist, odors will. Reluctant, crew will become. Burst, bowels will! Caw!

TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_030<tab>Tasked with crafting of <var 1A 02 /var>Dezul Qualan<var 1A 01 /var>'s disposal unit, we are. If connectors not perfect, leak, pipes will. Damage other components, our waste will. Disaster, there will be. Caw!

TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_040<tab>Materials, I will provide, but to craft the components, proper facilities, you will need. Seek Fyrbryda in Revenant's Toll, you must. Though spurned, an Ixal is, welcome to use gifts of art and knowledge, featherless ones are.
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_041<tab>To the Diamond Forge, you must go. To Fyrbryda, you must speak. The gifts of art, she tends. Guide you to perfection, she shall. Caw caw!
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_050<tab>To the Diamond Forge, you must go. To Fyrbryda, you must speak. Guide you to perfection, she shall. Caw!

TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_060<tab>We're busy here at the Diamond Forge, so I won't waste time mincing words. My rules here are simple. Follow them, and you are free to use the facilities for as long as you need.

TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_061<tab>Rule one─aught that passes through those doors must be inspected. I will have no contraband within my walls. Period. Rule two─you make a contribution of my choice to the Revenant's Toll chapter of the Adventurers' Guild. No questions asked. No exceptions.

TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_062<tab>If that suits you, journey to the Tangle and collect a thick vine from a morbol. It will be used to make sturdy rope, that miners can more safely scale the rugged crags of Mor Dhona.
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_063<tab>If it doesn't, you can leave, and let the broken backs of countless miners weigh on your conscience.
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_070<tab>Journey to the Tangle and slay a morbol for one of its vines. Do that, and the facilities are yours to use as you see fit.
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_090<tab>Quick now, before another miner meets an abrupt end.

TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_095<tab>Excellent! This will make for fine rope. As for your materials...though obviously of questionable origin, I have found naught the guild has deemed forbidden. Proceed, then.

TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_000_100<tab>If you require more time or materials, do not hesitate to ask, for today I am in your debt. I did not mention this before, but my dearest childhood friend will soon take up mining, and the rope we will make shall serve him well. For the peace of mind you have given me, it is the least I can do.

TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_FYRBRYDA_100_100<tab>I suppose this is farewell. If aught should happen to your work while on the road, do not hesitate to return here for additional materials, for this day I am in your debt. You see, I have just received word that my dear friend was in an accident...and were it not for his morbol vine rope, he would have fallen to his death like the others. Though he is injured, he will live to mine another day.
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_130<tab>Wrought perfection, you have? Give to Duzal, you must!
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_131<tab>Caw! Perfection, featherless one has brought. Free of odors, our ship will be.
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_DUZALMEYEAN_000_132<tab>My deepest thanks, featherless one has. Honor us, you would, to work on <var 1A 02 /var>Dezul Qualan<var 1A 01 /var> again in the future.
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_POPMESSAGE_000_200<tab>You now have access to the crafting facility.
TEXT_BANIXA504_01512_SYSTEM_200_200<tab>Normal-quality items crafted in the course of this quest serve no purpose and cannot be sold. It is recommended that you discard them.
